column2: # Using the given probabilties, this is a simulated data set to 'translate"
# the probabilties to the model terms
# Probabilities are in the order - Both, is, is not
# This function simulated one participant for 6 trials in each of three conditions
pptdf = rmultinom(1, size = 6, prob = probs) %>% as.data.frame() %>%
# This loop uses the function above 48 times and combines the results into a simulated dataframe
# This takes the loop results from the list they were stored in an binds them
